umbTextpage.bodyText:
Azure 服务计量 GUID 更新列表

为了更好的管理 Azure 服务的定价，我们计划对您正在使用的 Azure 服务计量 GUID 进行更新。

请注意，此更新不会影响计费，Azure 服务定价将保持不变，但会有部分计量名称或计量 GUID 发生改变。

Azure 自定义语音终结点托管

新的 GUID 将于 2020 年 1 月 1 日生效。

Product Family EA Portal Friendly Name Material Description Resource GUID
Azure China OE Speech - Custom Speech Model Hosting Units - CN East 2 Az Speech-Custom Speech Model Hosting Units-100/Hr-CN E2 2e0a8e51-9c5c-4b8c-9e29-a58347abb014
Azure China OE Speech - Custom Speech Model Hosting Units - CN North Az Speech-Custom Speech Model Hosting Units-100/Hr-CN N fb1e2a37-50b0-441b-9ae6-056811d6b400

Azure 流量分析新增间隔 10 分钟数据处理

新的 GUID 将于 2020 年 1 月 1 日生效。

Product Family EA Portal Friendly Name Material Description Resource GUID
Azure China OE Network Watcher - Traffic Analytics Processing at 10-Minute Interval - CN Az Network Watcher-Traffic Analytics Processing at 10-Min Int-10 GB-CN 11f4b70e-215b-4fb7-86c3-fac21bc72a60

Azure China OE SQL Database Single General Purpose - Serverless - Compute Gen5 - vCore - CN North 2 Az SQL DB Sgl Gen Pur-Serverless-Comp G5-vCore-10K Hrs-CN N2 00e73730-c3a1-4021-9edc-e1c0715ccf16
Azure China OE SQL Database Single General Purpose - Serverless - Compute Gen5 - vCore - CN East 2 Az SQL DB Sgl Gen Pur-Serverless-Comp G5-vCore-10K Hrs-CN E2 94cd5214-69c8-4ed5-a8e6-4613c832a982
Azure China OE SQL Database Single General Purpose - Serverless - Compute Gen5 - vCore - CN East Az SQL DB Sgl Gen Pur-Serverless-Comp G5-vCore-10K Hrs-CN E 58cf2da5-94c6-4eee-90ea-131b696a9f61
